name: Letter Dash (rugeboy)
description:
Use the keyboard to dash around the screen, avoiding and defeating enemies, and trying to rack up a high score.

GLITCHES- There were some glitches that I was unfortunately unable to fix 

-Sometimes two letters will be swapped. For example if you type V you go to W and vice versa.  If this happens just click the restart button in the top right to restart and that should fix it. 

-Sometimes turning all letters gold doesn't defeat all enemies. If this happens, go to the first letter you turned gold again and it should work.

-I apologize for these issues, but I wasn't able to figure out the source of the problems to fix them, and I hope they don't ruin your enjoyment.

This game was submitted for the Everything is text Jam 1 where all of the sprites had to be made entirely of text.

Thanks for playing!
